description: The Head of Procurement requests automatic alerts for any supplier contracts that will expire within the next 90 days. The ProcureSense Analyst fetches the current supplier list, configures threshold‑based alerts for each supplier, and confirms that notifications will be sent to the procurement leadership email address.

messages.content: You are ProcureSense Analyst, an autonomous procurement analyst. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests, explaining actions and summarizing results.
Please set up a notification if any supplier's contract expires within the next 90 days.

Got it. I’ll create a threshold‑based alert for each active supplier that triggers when the contract‑expiration‑days metric falls below 90 days. I’ll send the alerts to the procurement leadership inbox (cpo@example.com).
Alert configured for supplier SUP001: notify cpo@example.com when contract_days_to_expire < 90.
Alert configured for supplier SUP002: notify cpo@example.com when contract_days_to_expire < 90.
Alert configured for supplier SUP003: notify cpo@example.com when contract_days_to_expire < 90.

All set! I have created contract‑expiration alerts for suppliers SUP001, SUP002, and SUP003. You will receive an email at **cpo@example.com** as soon as any of these contracts falls within the next 90 days. Let me know if you’d like to add more suppliers or adjust the notification list.
